News.headline: TV Fixture: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.page_title: TV Fixture: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.URL_keywords: TV Fixture: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town
News.short_description: BTSport has announced a further four fixtures from the Vanarama National League to be screened LIVE during the Christmas and New Year period.
News.description:
Included as one of the four games live on BT Sport will be the Daggers' game against Braintree Town which will now be played on Monday 2nd January with a 7:45pm kick off, after being moved from the original date of Sunday 1st January.

Full information from the Vanarama National League games that will be live on BT Sport:

Monday 26th December: Aldershot Town v Woking 12:15pm kick off.
Tuesday 27th December: Eastleigh v Boreham Wood 7:45pm kick off.
Sunday 1st January: Maidstone United v Dover Athletic 6:00pm kick off.
Monday 2nd January: Dagenham and Redbridge v Braintree Town 7:45pm kick off.
